dict.acceptation: 注意；记录；对…加注释；指出；

sent.orig: C-Note walks to where Michael stood.
NOTE: Payment is expected within 10 days of the auction closing.
sent.trans: NOTE:付款方式是在10日的拍卖结束预期。

sent.orig: NOTE: Shipping & handling covers more than just the actual shipping costs.
sent.trans: NOTE:运输和处理涉及的不仅仅是实际运费。

sent.orig: Geary makes sure C-Note understands he wants cash.
C-Note pulls up his sweatshirt to reveal the wound.
sent.trans: C-Note揭开了他的运动衫，现出了他的伤口。
